design_philosophy.emotional_tone: Authoritative, Lethal Precision, Absolute Security, High-Tech Oversight
design_philosophy.visual_style: Military Tactical HUD mixed with Swiss Enterprise Clarity
key_principles: Information Density: High for Dealers/Gov, Low for Citizens
Tactical Aesthetics: Corner markers, scanlines, monospace data
Motion: Staggered entrances, micro-interactions, no 'bouncy' physics
Accessibility: High contrast in both Dark (Night Ops) and Light (Base Command) modes

usage_rules: Headings (Manrope): Uppercase for top-level headers, bold weights (600/700/800)
Body (Inter): High legibility, relaxed line-height for long text
Data/HUD (JetBrains Mono): MANDATORY for all IDs, Prices, coordinates, timestamps, and status badges
Tracking: Tight (-0.02em) for headings, Wide (0.05em) for uppercase labels

visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid var(--border). Active elements get 'Tactical Glow' (box-shadow with primary color)
visual_enhancers.corners: Sharp edges (rounded-sm or rounded-md). Key containers get 'Corner Brackets' using pseudo-elements
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Heavy blur (backdrop-blur-xl) with slight noise texture. Dark mode: bg-slate-950/70. Light mode: bg-white/70
visual_enhancers.scanlines: Overlay linear-gradient repeating pattern on Hero sections and sensitive data panels (opacity 0.05)
visual_enhancers.shadows: crisp, directional shadows. No soft diffuse 'material' shadows

buttons.style: Flat or Outline with 'Cut Corners' or 'Tech Borders'
buttons.hover: Instant color swap or 'Glitch' effect. No slow fades

cards.style: Border-heavy, minimal shadow. Background: Surface color
cards.header: Distinct header area with bottom border
cards.highlight: Optional left-border accent color based on status (Red/Green/Amber)

inputs.style: Rectangular, bg-background, border-input. Focus: Ring-2 ring-primary ring-offset-2 ring-offset-background
inputs.typography: Input text should be Mono for data entry

badges.style: Outline only or low-opacity background. Sharp corners. Mono font

landing_page.grid: Tetris Grid (Mode A). Asymmetric. Hero uses full width or 8-col span
landing_page.vibe: Public facing authority. Trust-building. High-end imagery

dealer_portal.grid: High Density (Mode B). 100% width utilization. Split view (List | Detail)

government_dashboard.grid: Bento Grid (Dense). Map centric. Real-time feeds

motion.loading: Scanning radar line or blinking cursor

media.icons: Lucide React (Stroke width: 1.5 or 2). Sharp, technical icons preferred

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Ensure dark mode is default but light mode is perfectly readable (Government requirement). Use the provided tactical color palette.
2. TYPOGRAPHY: Import Manrope and JetBrains Mono immediately. Apply JetBrains Mono to ALL numeric data, IDs, and tabular data.
3. PWA: Register the service worker. Add manifest.json with 'standalone' display mode.
4. COMPONENTS: Use shadcn/ui but STRIP the default rounding. Set rounded-lg to rounded-sm or rounded-none for that military sharpness.
5. DASHBOARDS: Implement the 3 separate dashboards (Citizen, Dealer, Gov) with distinct layouts as defined in 'layout_strategies'.
6. LANDING PAGE: Use the 'Tetris Grid' with the tactical hero images. Implement a 'Role Select' login modal (Citizen/Dealer/Gov).
7. DETAILS: Add 'corner markers' (CSS pseudo-elements) to main containers to give that HUD look.
8. MAPS: Use a dark-mode styled map placeholder (or Leaflet if capable) for the Government dashboard.
universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use grids.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition (transition: all).
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
